name: Solitude - Chapter 1: The Base of Mars
name_original: Solitude - Chapter 1: The Base of Mars
description:
Explore 
Explore an abandoned martian base while you try to search for a way out. A suspenseful resource management 2D side-scroller.

Collect
Collect all notes found throughout the game and try to piece together what happened in Eris Base.

Immerse
Immerse yourself in the game's world, with it's original soundtrack and suspenseful atmosphere.

Survive
Survive the harsh conditions of a base built on planet Mars. Try to keep it active and running in order to stay alive.

Features:

  • Resource Management: don't let your base crumble or your oxygen tank empty.  Manage the base power, structural integrity and heat level while keeping an eye on your oxygen.
  • Slight Procedural Item placement: every time you play the key items will change it's places. 
  • Suspenseful Atmosphere: explore ERIS Base and uncover it's secret.
  • Original Soundtrack: immerse yourself in the game with our original soundtrack.
